name: NOISZ
description:
NOISZ fuses music game and shoot-em-up elements to create a frantic new experience that demands lightning reflexes, keen sense of rhythm, and judicious decision making!

Even shmup and rhythm game veterans will find there’s still a lot to learn... but intuitive core gameplay will ensure that everyone’s quickly blasting away to the beat!



Featuring a lineup of 16 hard-hitting tracks, challenging boss fights with unique mechanics in each stage, deep and fun scoring mechanics that provide tens of hours of intense gameplay, several gameplay styles that you can choose between to suit the situation or your personal preference, a story in full-fledged visual novel form packed with colorful characters and surprising twists, and even dance pad support--NOISZ fuses its component genres to become unlike anything else you've ever played!
